changeSet.author: alex
changeSet.comment: Remove mismatched indicatorValue entries. The API at somepoint allowed users to set indicator values on sites for indicators which belonged to an activity different than the site. These indicator values are not visible through the user interface and in most cases would not be visible from the pivot table.
changeSet.sql: DELETE iv FROM indicatorvalue iv JOIN indicator i ON (iv.indicatorid=i.indicatorid) JOIN reportingperiod rp ON (rp.reportingperiodid=iv.reportingPeriodid) JOIN site s ON (rp.siteid=s.siteid) WHERE s.activityid != i.activityid;
